docs.snippet: The producers have been preparing for various narratives to build out on the show, which will be hosted by Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adam Shankman and Bill Mechanic are the odd couple of Oscar producers: during the announcement on Tuesday in Beverly Hills, Mr. Shankman was bejeweled and jumpy, Mr. Mechanic beige and calm. Though they have been working for months to build a show with populist appeal based on this year's expanded field of 10 best picture nominees, they admitted they have no idea how the new voting system for that category works.
docs.abstract: The producers have been preparing for various narratives to build out on the show, which will be hosted by Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin.

docs.snippet: The producers of the Oscar telecast, who are looking for a ratings boost from the expanded field of 10 best pictures nominees, said they were pleasantly surprised by the inclusion of some decidedly non-art house fare....
docs.lead_paragraph: There was a wave of cheering in the press room when "The Blind Side" was announced as a best picture contender on Tuesday morning. In a year tailor-made for surprises, the Oscars delivered some, with the box-office hit nabbing a lead spot and a nomination for its star, Sandra Bullock. "District 9," the sci-fi feature set in South Africa, also did well, with a best picture nomination and nods for editing, visual effects and best adapted screenplay.
docs.abstract: The producers of the Oscar telecast, who are looking for a ratings boost from the expanded field of 10 best pictures nominees, said they were pleasantly surprised by the inclusion of some decidedly non-art house fare.

docs.snippet: The Academy scattered its honors among an unusually wide field of contenders....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Academy scattered its honors among an unusually wide field of contenders.

docs.snippet: Carpetbagger: The Oscar nominations were announced early Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Oscar nominations were announced at dawn on Tuesday. The full story and the complete list of nominees are on the Carpetbagger blog. Bottom line: Lots of love for James Cameron, Quentin Tarantino and "The Hurt Locker" -- not so much for Clint Eastwood. Check in with Carpetbagger throughout the day for Oscar updates.
docs.abstract: Carpetbagger: The Oscar nominations were announced early Tuesday.

headline.main: Carpetbagger: The Oscar Nominations are Unveiled

docs.snippet: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences scattered its honors among an unusually wide field of contenders on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Update | 9:41 a.m. "Avatar" and "The Hurt Locker" narrowly led the Oscar nominees, with nine nominations each, including best picture and best director, as the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences scattered its honors among an unusually wide field of contenders on Tuesday.
docs.abstract: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences scattered its honors among an unusually wide field of contenders on Tuesday.

headline.main: 'Avatar' and 'Hurt Locker' Lead the Oscar Field

docs.lead_paragraph: Below is the full list of the 82nd Annual Oscar Nominations, which were announced Tuesday morning:

docs.snippet: 10 P.M. (BET) THE MICHAEL VICK PROJECT This new documentary series chronicles the return of Michael Vick (above, second from left, with family members) to football as a backup quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. A former first-stringer for th...
docs.lead_paragraph: 10 P.M. (BET) THE MICHAEL VICK PROJECT This new documentary series chronicles the return of Michael Vick (above, second from left, with family members) to football as a backup quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. A former first-stringer for the Atlanta Falcons, Mr. Vick lost his contract after pleading guilty to bankrolling a dog-fighting operation in 2007. After 18 months in prison, he was released to find his relationship with the N.F.L. and his family strained. This series investigates his life before prison as well as his experiences after. 4 P.M. (ABC); 7 P.M. (55) THE OPRAH WINFREY SHOW Ms. Winfrey interviews the children of Wanda E. Barzee, who in November pleaded guilty to federal charges of kidnapping and unlawful transportation of a minor in exchange for a 15-year prison term in the case of Elizabeth Smart. In 2002 Ms. Smart, then 14, was abducted from her Salt Lake City home by Ms. Barzee and her husband, Brian D. Mitchell, and held for nine months as a captive teenage wife.

docs.snippet: INTERACTIVE FEATURE An interactive ballot for the Academy Awards, featuring Oscar pools and readers' comments, will be available after the nominations are announced Tuesday morning.     nytimes.com/movies...
docs.lead_paragraph: INTERACTIVE FEATURE An interactive ballot for the Academy Awards, featuring Oscar pools and readers' comments, will be available after the nominations are announced Tuesday morning. nytimes.com/movies

docs.snippet: An obituary last Tuesday about the jazz drummer Ed Thigpen erroneously attributed a distinction to him. While he was a drummer with the Oscar Peterson Trio, he was not the first. At least one other drummer, Gene Gammage, preceded him....
docs.lead_paragraph: An obituary last Tuesday about the jazz drummer Ed Thigpen erroneously attributed a distinction to him. While he was a drummer with the Oscar Peterson Trio, he was not the first. At least one other drummer, Gene Gammage, preceded him.
